ygData.subject: Re: Michael - Warrior only shield?
ygData.msgSnippet: u have to kill the unicorn in lesser faydark to get the shield. the unicorn is lvl 45. the shield itselfs doubles as a weapon i think 9dm pierceing.
ygData.messageBody:
u have to kill the unicorn in lesser faydark to get the shield. the unicorn
is lvl 45. the shield itselfs doubles as a weapon i think 9dm pierceing.
